product_name: Tifosi Veloce Polarized Interchangable Sunglasses - Men's
long_description: From biking to paddling to snowsports, the Tifosi Veloce Polarized interchangable sunglasses are a great choice for multiple activities in a range of light conditions. Frame includes 3 sets of lenses (gray, red and yellow tints) that accommodate bright light, low-medium light and nighttime conditions. Polarized gray lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain. Gray GT (golf and tennis) lens helps illuminate balls; red EC (extreme contrast) lens helps distinguish details in the terrain-great for runs and biking. Lightweight and virtually shatterproof, polycarbonate lenses are 20 times more impact-resistant than glass and one-third the weight. Ventilated lenses increase airflow to help eliminate fogging. Grilamid(R) TR90 lightweight nylon frames offer a consistent fit, flexibility and impact-resistance in all temperatures. Hydrophilic rubber nosepiece and temple ends become tackier when wet for reliable grip during exercise and hot weather. Fits small to large faces. Tifosi Veloce Polarized interchangable sunglasses include a semirigid zippered storage case and cleaning cloth.
